Notes

Artwork etched on the F-side of the vinyl. All sides end in locked grooves, meant to keep the album's segues and "Cassandra Gemini" intact. Runouts are etched. Published by: Hija de Lola (ASCAP), Amputekthure (ASCAP), EMI April Music Inc Engineered at the following locations: 373 Ewingsdale, Byron Bay, Australia 6540 Matilija, Van Nuys, California 291 South Lake Street, Burbank, California 3400 Eagle Rock Blvd, Los Angeles, California 453 Mario Julia Industrial Park, San Juan, Puerto Rico 5161 North Cartwright Ave, N Hollywood, California 3222 Los Feliz Blvd, Los Angeles, California 441 W 53rd Street, New York City, New York Mixed at: Avatar Studios, New York City Flea and John Frusciante appear courtesy of Warner Brothers Records. Some copies also come with a Gold Standard Laboratories catalogue booklet and a 7x8'' black and white Mars Volta glossy photograph.
